Based in Palo Alto, Calif., Machine Zone, Inc. (formerly known as Addmired, Inc.) is focused on creating the most engaging free-to-play mobile social games in the world. Launched in 2008 with Y Combinator, Machine Zone has seen explosive annual growth with its highly successful free-to-play games, including Game of War: Fire Age, iMob 2, Original Gangstaz, Global War, Race or Die 2, among others. To date, the company has well over 40 million downloads of their iPhone games and is the recipient of the 2010 Crunchies Award (Techcrunch) for Best Bootstrapped Startup. Machine Zone operates profitably and has raised two rounds of funding from Anthos Capital, Baseline Ventures and Menlo Ventures. 
 
We are a unique, highly talented and ambitious team of free-to-play game experts and rock-star engineers, all focused on building highly engaging mobile experiences for our gamers. We continue to expand our teams and look for top talent around the world to build not only the most exciting technical and social projects in mobile gaming, but to help create the best gaming company. Come and be part of the revolution! Sourcing 
• Advanced internet search techniques including Boolean logic & operators, X-ray, Flip-search across multiple 
search engine platforms (internal and external) – certified in Internet Recruitment. 
• Using various Job Boards and Social/Professional Networking tools and sites (i.e. LinkedIn, Xing, Google, Twitter, Facebook) to identify and engage passive candidates. 
• Maximising the use of networking with an emphasis on referrals and recommendations (i.e. organising networking events). 
 
Screening and Selection 
• Advanced screening skills including reviewing candidates suitability, running background checks (references, testimonials) and using online technical tests to assess applicants’ knowledge and experience.

• Driving offer process – including negotiating employment contracts, closing candidates, extending offers, and generating offer letters and relevant documentation.

• Managing consultants on assignment and assisting with resolving any potential issues.  
• Monitoring KPIs and providing regular two-way feedbacks to consultants and hiring managers. 
• Building strong relationships with an emphasis on candidate retention and re-engagement where extension is not possible.
